name: ListRealmAssignments
description:
Retrieve all realm assignments from Okta.

Use this tool to list all realm assignments in Okta. It is helpful for managing and reviewing current realm assignments.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of realm assignments to return.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor for pagination to continue listing from the last fetched realm assignment.

value_schema.description: The cursor used for pagination. It represents the priority of the last realm assignment returned in the previous fetch operation.
